messages.subject: for the love of jehosophat.....
messages.msgSnippet: ........PLEASE do NOT include the other persons ENTIRE response when responding.  This list is SO busy right now, and I have a hard enough time reading
messages.messageBody:
........PLEASE do NOT include the other persons ENTIRE response when responding. This list is SO busy right now, and I have a hard enough time reading everything. So, can we make a concerted effort when replying to include ONLY the part you are referring too and not 3 or 4 posts worth.

Thank you.

On a side note - Sandra is not evil. Sandra has the ability to tweak my nerves, but she always gets me thinking. And for that, I am grateful. If it weren't for Sandra getting my "hairs" up, I wouldn't be the unschooler I am today.

Lynda - you get me thinking as well. Sometimes I think you believe we are all imbeciles here so you have to beat the snot out of us to get your point across - but it is not the case. I truly believe you feel so passionately about the topics you "jump" on. In the future, write a response, and reread it about 20 times before you hit send. We aren't stupid, we are human. If I knew you IRL I could probably figure out what was an attack, and what wasn't - most of us aren't privvy to that so that is why folks feel you go for the jugular. Write a passionate post, but make sure it isn't towards a person please.

YMMV,
Karen Mowery


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
